Welcome to AbstractSTM32Fx’s documentation!¶

Indices and tables¶

  • Index

  • Module Index

  • Search Page

struct pin

Struct for storing data about pin

uint8_t port¶

GPIO Port ID. Can be GPIOA…GPIOK

uint8_t num¶

GPIO Pin number. Can be 0..15

uint8_t dir¶

GPIO Pin direction Can be GPIO_MODE_INPUT, GPIO_MODE_OUTPUT

uint8_t mode¶

GPIO Pin Analog/Digital Mode Can be GPIO_MODE_AF, GPIO_MODE_ANALOG

uint8_t otype¶

GPIO Output Pin Driver Type Can be GPIO_OTYPE_OD (open drain), GPIO_OTYPE_PP (push pull)

uint8_t speed¶

GPIO Output Pin Speed Can be GPIO_OSPEED_2MHZ, GPIO_OSPEED_25MHZ, GPIO_OSPEED_50MHZ, GPIO_OSPEED_100MHZ

uint8_t pull_up_down¶

GPIO Output Pin Pullup Can be GPIO_PUPD_NONE, GPIO_PUPD_PULLDOWN, GPIO_PUPD_PULLUP

uint8_t is_inverse¶

Flag that specify if the pin is inversed. If true, abst_digital_write and abst_digital_read functions inverse the value at the pin.

void abst_init()¶

Initialize the library. 1) Start systick

void sys_tick_handler()¶

SysTick interruption handler. In case of redefining of this function make sure to call sys_tick_handler to call abst_sys_tick_handler to keep PWM and delay alive

void abst_gpio_init(const struct pin pin)¶

Initialize the pin with the setting that specified in struct pin.

Parameters

  • pin – pin struct with filled parameters.

void abst_digital_write(const struct pin pin, int value)¶

Set value at the output of the pin.

Parameters

  • pin – The pin struct with filled parameters.

  • value – The value to set. If is_inverse flag in struc pin is true value will be inversed.

void abst_toggle(const struct pin pin)¶

Toggle value of a pin

Parameters

  • pin – The pin struct with filled parameters.

int abst_digital_read()¶

Read value from the pin via the input driver. :param pin: The pin struct with filled parameters. :return: Read value.

void abst_pwm_write(struct pin pin, uint16_t value)¶

Set Pulse Wide Modulation at the pin. TO DO :param pin: The pin struct with filled parameters. :param value: the duty cycle: between 0 (always off) and 4095 (always on).

uint16_t abst_adc_read(struct pin pin)¶

Read analog value from the pin via the Analog to Digital Converter (!) TO DO :param pin: The pin struct with filled parameters. :return: Read value (12 bit)

void delay_ms(uint64_t miliseconds)¶

Stop program for a given time. :param miliseconds: Time to wait.

void sleep_wfi()¶

Go to wait for interruption mode and set _sleep_ to true. After interrupt by which microcontroller should be woken up permanentry call stop_sleep().

void stop_sleep()¶

Wake up microcontroller permanently (set _sleep_ to false).

AbstractSTM32Fx
